seoMetaDescription.default: Read Clensy's privacy policy. Learn how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use our cleaning services.

seoKeywords.default: privacy policy, data protection, personal information, Clensy privacy

ogDescription.default: Your privacy is important to us. Learn how Clensy protects your information.

heroDescription.default: Your privacy is important to us. Learn how we collect, use, and protect your information.

default.title: 1. Information We Collect
default.content:
We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, book a service, or contact us for support. This may include:

• Name and contact information (email, phone number, address)
• Payment information
• Service preferences and history
• Communications with our team

default.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
default.content:
We use the information we collect to:

• Provide, maintain, and improve our services
• Process transactions and send related information
• Send promotional communications (with your consent)
• Respond to your comments, questions, and requests
• Monitor and analyze trends, usage, and activities

default.title: 3. Information Sharing
default.content:
We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to outside parties except:

• To trusted third parties who assist us in operating our website and conducting our business
• When required by law or to protect our rights
• With your consent

default.title: 4. Data Security
default.content: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure.

default.title: 5. Your Rights
default.content:
You have the right to:

• Access your personal information
• Correct inaccurate data
• Request deletion of your data
• Opt-out of marketing communications
• Lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority

default.title: 6. Cookies and Tracking
default.content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track activity on our website and hold certain information. You can instruct your browser to refuse all cookies or to indicate when a cookie is being sent.

default.title: 7. Changes to This Policy
default.content: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the 'Last Updated' date.

smsConsentDescription.default: By providing your phone number, you consent to receive SMS messages from Clensy regarding your bookings, service updates, and promotional offers. Message and data rates may apply.

smsOptOutInstructions.default: To opt out of SMS messages, reply STOP to any message. For help, reply HELP or contact us at info@clensy.com.
